variables.name: Contents_AutoSaveFailed
variables.value: Auto save failed because the storage device has been removed.

variables.name: Contents_AutoSaveRetry
variables.value:
Auto save failed. 
To retry auto save, select YES. 
If you select NO, the game data will not be saved until the next auto save.

variables.name: Contents_AutoSaveRetry_ReturnTitle
variables.value: Auto save failed. To retry auto save, select YES. If you select NO, any progress made will be deleted.

variables.name: Contents_Broken
variables.value: The save data is corrupted and could not be loaded.

variables.name: Contents_BrokenAsk1
variables.value:
Save data is corrupted. 
Do you want to delete the corrupted data and create new save data? 

If you delete the corrupted save data, it will be gone forever. If you do not delete it, you will not be able to save your data.

variables.name: Contents_BrokenAsk2
variables.value:
Save data is corrupted. 
Do you want to delete the corrupt data and create new save data? 

If you delete the corrupted save data, it will be gone forever. If you do not delete it, you will not be able to save your game to the storage device in which the corrupted data is stored.

variables.value:
New save data will be created.

variables.name: Contents_ConfirmCreateReconnect

New save data will be created.

variables.name: Invite_Default
variables.value:
Calling all Earth Defense Force soldiers. The earth is in danger. Prepare for immediate deployment!
【%MODENAME%】
【%MISSIONNAME%】
【%DIFFICULTY%】

variables.name: LevelSelect_Easy_Desc
variables.value:
Winning battles is a breeze in this mode, but you're unlikely to find any worthwhile weapons. Select this mode when a mission is too hard for you.

[Friendly Fire Damage]

10% of normal damage
Your attacks don't knock your allies down.

variables.name: LevelSelect_Hard_Desc
variables.value:
This mode is challenging. Try this mode after you have completed NORMAL mode, increased your armor (HP) and obtained a respectable arsenal. 

[Friendly Fire Damage]

50% of normal damage
Your attacks don't knock your allies down.

variables.name: LevelSelect_Hardest_Desc
variables.value:
This is much harder than HARD mode. Winning requires not only high-end equipment, but well-honed skills. For experienced and confident players.

[Friendly Fire Damage]

75% of normal damage
Your attacks can knock your allies down.

variables.name: LevelSelect_Inferno_Desc
variables.value:
A special difficulty, requiring exceptional gear, great skills and careful strategies. You don't have to play this mode.

[Friendly Fire Damage]

100% of normal damage
Your attacks can knock your allies down.

variables.name: LevelSelect_Normal_Desc
variables.value:
This is the regular difficulty. Try to complete this mode first.

[Friendly Fire Damage]

25% of normal damage
Your attacks don't knock your allies down.

variables.name: LoadSaveInfo_SlotCorruptDesc
variables.value: The save data in this slot is corrupted.

variables.name: LoadSaveInfo_SlotDesc
variables.value: Continue the game where you left off.

variables.name: Loading_Desc_001
variables.value:
Rangers are combat experts who can handle a wide range of weapons. These versatile soldiers can handle any situation and serve as the core of an infantry unit. 

*This soldier class is the easiest to use and has the highest combat strength. If you are playing the game for the first time, you should start out by choosing this soldier class.

variables.name: Loading_Desc_002
variables.value:
An all-female special forces unit equipped with jetpacks. This unit was formed as a secret weapon against giant creatures. They use high-tech armament born from extraterrestrial technology. 

*This soldier class is swift and deadly. However, their low armor strength makes them particularly susceptible to attacks.

variables.name: Loading_Desc_003
variables.value:
The mission of the Air Raider is to coordinate air strikes and bombardments from the ground. The Air Raider annihilates the enemy by designating attack targets and ordering explosive strikes. Air Raiders can call in bombers, artillery, cruise missiles and even vehicle drops.

*This soldier class is for intermediate players. Because the main purpose of this soldier class is to assist allies, it is best suited for cooperative gameplay. You should probably select this soldier class after you've gained a certain degree of familiarity with the game.

variables.name: Loading_Desc_004
variables.value:
A heavily armed soldier fully equipped with a power frame and armor. Thanks to their power frames, this soldier class is capable of equipping enormous weapons. Also, this soldier class can carry separate weapons in both arms and wield both of them at the same time. 

*This soldier class is for advanced players. Its controls are different than those of other soldier classes, and playing this class well requires learning several new techniques. Mastery of this class will grant players terrifying power, but the path to mastery is very challenging.

variables.name: Loading_Desc_005
variables.value: You can aim and fire even while you're being bitten. Blow a few holes in whatever's chewing on you, and you just might convince the creature to spit you back out.

variables.name: Loading_Desc_006
variables.value: You can aim and fire even while you're being bitten. However, enemies can also thrash you around in mid-bite, temporarily preventing you from moving. Keep calm and look for a chance to shoot your way out of their jaws.

variables.name: Loading_Desc_007
variables.value: You can switch weapons even while you're being bitten. Pick the best weapon for the situation (hint: not explosives) and make the enemy choke on it!

variables.name: Loading_Desc_008
variables.value: When another player is being bitten, an icon will appear. If you see this icon, save the other player immediately by defeating the enemy who's biting them.

variables.name: Loading_Desc_009
variables.value: You can aim even when you've been caught in a web. Aim for the webbing and fire until it breaks and lets you loose.

variables.name: Loading_Desc_010
variables.value: You can switch weapons even after you've been caught in a web. Aim for the webbing and go on firing until it breaks! ...Just preferably not with explosives.

variables.name: Loading_Desc_011
variables.value: If you find an ally who's been caught in a web, destroy the web immediately to save them.

variables.name: Loading_Desc_012
variables.value: Retiarius webs are extremely dangerous. Not only can they ensnare you, but they'll pull you toward the Retiarius with tremendous force. The only way to save yourself is to defeat the Retiarius at the other end of the web.

variables.name: Loading_Desc_013
variables.value: Getting caught in an alien creature's web and dragged toward the jaws of death can be demoralizing to say the least. Remember that you can still escape by destroying the webbing or the creature who created it, depending.

variables.name: Loading_Desc_014
variables.value:
The radar is full of information. 

Red: Enemy    Blue: EDF soldier    Green: Item
Yellow: Vehicle    White: Civilian

Circles with letters in them represent other players. The letters indicate their classes. 
The radar also shows Air Raiders' kill zones.

variables.name: Loading_Desc_015
variables.value: Air Raiders and Rangers are the only ones who can drive vehicles. These two soldier classes can ride in either the pilot's seat or the gunner's seat. Wing Divers and Fencers cannot ride in the pilot's seat, only in the gunner's seat.

variables.name: Loading_Desc_016
variables.value: To reload air raids and vehicle drop requests, you need credits. You'll accumulate credits as your team defeats enemies.

variables.name: Loading_Desc_017
variables.value: Some weapons used by Fencers have two different functions. For example, if you have a vibro-drive hammer in your right hand, not only can you use it to attack by pressing the right-hand attack button, you can also use it for a thrust-dash by pressing the right-hand equipment use button.

variables.name: Loading_Desc_018
variables.value: A Fencer's shield is an extremely useful piece of equipment, but it has its drawbacks. Shields reduce their users' walking speed while being brandished, and they can only block attacks from certain angles (which vary depending on the shield's make and model).

variables.name: Loading_Desc_019
variables.value: Be sure to request vehicles in clear, open areas. Otherwise, your vehicle may get caught on buildings or other terrain.

variables.name: Loading_Desc_020
variables.value: When you see friendly soldiers with icons over their heads, get close to recruit them. The soldiers you recruit will fall under your command and work together with you. If you recruit a team leader, the entire team will fall under your command.

variables.name: Loading_Desc_021
variables.value: By taking healing items, Rangers can heal all the soldiers under their command.

variables.name: Loading_Desc_022
variables.value: A Ranger's body armor is tough, but also easy to move in. Among the four soldier classes, they're the quickest to recover from a knockdown.

variables.name: Loading_Desc_023
variables.value: When Wing Divers are knocked down, they can recover quickly by pressing the flight button. Be aware that this consumes energy.

variables.name: Loading_Desc_024
variables.value: If a Fencer is armed with at least one thruster dash or boost jump-enabled weapon, they can use that dash or jump to recover from a fall just before they hit the ground. Be aware that this maneuver requires very precise timing.

variables.name: Loading_Desc_025
variables.value: Fencers' armor gives them mass equivalent to a small car. Any small objects they hit, such as guard rails, will be demolished.

variables.name: Loading_Desc_026
variables.value: Rangers train to make their bodies tough as steel. Colliding with objects doesn't faze them, and any small object they happen to roll over will be destroyed.

variables.name: Loading_Title_008
variables.value: Foiling Foes Who Feast on Friendlies

variables.name: Loading_Title_013
variables.value: Don't Let Them Drag You Down

variables.name: SoldierType_AirRaider_Info
variables.value:
Air Raider. The mission of the Air Raider is to coordinate air strikes and bombardments from the ground. The Air Raider annihilates the enemy by designating attack targets and ordering explosive strikes. Air Raiders can call in bombers, artillery, cruise missiles and even vehicle drops.

*This soldier class is for intermediate players. Because the main purpose of this soldier class is to assist allies, it is best suited for cooperative gameplay. You should probably select this soldier class after you've gained a certain degree of familiarity with the game.

variables.name: SoldierType_Fencer_Info
variables.value:
Fencer. A heavily armed soldier fully equipped with a power frame and armor. Thanks to their power frames, this soldier class is capable of equipping enormous weapons. Also, this soldier class can carry separate weapons in both arms and wield both of them at the same time. 

*This soldier class is for advanced players. Its controls are different than those of other soldier classes, and playing this class well requires learning several new techniques. Mastery of this class will grant players terrifying power, but the path to mastery is very challenging.

variables.name: SoldierType_Ranger_Info
variables.value:
Infantry special forces. Rangers are combat experts who can handle a wide range of weapons. These versatile soldiers can handle any situation and serve as the core of an infantry unit. 

*This soldier class is the easiest to use and has the highest combat strength. If you are playing the game for the first time, you should start out by choosing this soldier class.

variables.name: SoldierType_WingDiver_Info
variables.value:
Wing Diver. An all-female special forces unit equipped with jetpacks. This unit was formed as a secret weapon against giant creatures. They use high-tech armament born from extraterrestrial technology. 

*This soldier class is swift and deadly. However, their low armor strength makes them particularly susceptible to attacks.

variables.name: StatusInfo_AllClearRatio
variables.value: Completion Rate for All Difficulty Levels:

variables.name: Sys_AutoSaveWarning
variables.value:
This game supports an auto save feature.
Please do not turn off the system while the saving icon is displayed on the screen.

variables.value: Do you want to change the screen mode?

variables.value: the setting will return if you don't control in %d seconds.

The controller has been disconnected. 
Reconnect the controller.

variables.value: Are you sure you want to exit the game?

variables.name: Sys_InviteAccepted
variables.value:
You have accepted an invite.
Prepare to join the game.

variables.name: Sys_InviteCancel
variables.value:
You received an invite, but because you do not have the required content, 
you will be returned to the title screen.

variables.name: Sys_InviteFailed
variables.value: You received an invite, but an error has occured. The invite process will be canceled.

variables.name: Sys_JoinGameAccepted
variables.value: You received a session's information. Prepare to join the session.

variables.name: Sys_JoinGameCancel
variables.value: You received a session's information, but since you don't have the required content, you cannot join.

variables.name: Sys_JoinGameFailed
variables.value: Failed to receive the session's information. You cannot join this session at this time.

variables.value: Failed to load the save data. You will be returned to the save menu screen.

variables.name: Sys_LoadFailed_ToTitle
variables.value: Failed to load the save data. You will be returned to the title screen.

variables.name: Sys_NormalReset
variables.value: You will be returned to the title screen.

variables.name: Sys_PadNotFound
variables.value: To play in this mode, you must have at least two controllers that are recognized by the system.

variables.name: Sys_SignInChanged
variables.value: You have been signed out. You cannot play online mode without signing in. You will be returned to the title screen.

so you will be returned to the title screen.

variables.value:
The storage device containing downloadable content has been removed,
 so you will be returned to the title screen

variables.name: ps3_GameMode_NoOnlineMode
variables.value: Currently, you cannot join online sessions. To join online sesssions, please load your save data properly.

variables.name: ps3_GameMode_NoOnlineMode_Invite
variables.value: You've received an invite, but currently, you cannot join online sessions. To join online sessions, please load your save data properly.

variables.name: xbox_Sys_GuestStartError
variables.value:
You cannot start a game from a guest account. 
Sign out, then sign in with a different account.

meta.help: For examples of these values, open WEAPONTABLE.SGO and WEAPONTEXT.SGO
